title: The Powerball is currently worth $27 Million yet the cash payout is $14.1 Million. Taxes have to be payed on the $14.1 Million. What happened to the $12.9 Million? ($27 Million - $14.1 Million)
text:
The winner must pay taxes on the total winnings, $27 million in this
case. The lump-sum payout includes a deduction for the taxes on the
full amount. Winners can also choose to take the winnings in a
long-term annuity.

For more information:

http://www.nc-educationlottery.org/
